text: Kaja Verdnik (born 23 February 1999) is a Slovenian snowboarder. She competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in the Women's Halfpipe. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Slovenian female snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Slovenia
title: Kaja Verdnik
